DocAttribute.Name: Mode
DocAttribute.Documentation: The _Mode_ attribute describes the algorithm used to compute texture coordinates. > NOTE  The applicable values for the _Mode_ attribute are determined by view definitions or implementer agreements. It is recommended to use the modes described in ISO/IES 19775-1.2:2008 X3D Architecture and base components Edition 2, Part 1. See [18.4.8 TextureCoordinateGenerator](http://www.web3d.org/x3d/specifications/ISO-IEC-19775-1.2-X3D-AbstractSpecification/Part01/components/texturing.html#TextureCoordinateGenerator) for recommended values.

DocAttribute.Name: Parameter
